response.answer_text: Visualization is the most important thing. When someone buys a camera he doesn't become a photographer. Although it's easier to learn photography on a better camera. Your visualization is the key element in your photograph. A certain thing or view might look amazing at certain angle and under certain light. No one goes to a sunrise point at 10 and say 'Kya bakwas jagah pe aye hue hain, Could've slept for a couple more hours’. Everything has time and angle to look good Understanding that before hand and being able to visualize it makes you a photographer.

As a photographer there is not a requirement you can just capture the moments that are special to you. To me photography is a feeling to capture the moment which I desire.yeah there are some time where we don't get what we see fit ,so we change angles a little bit to have creative thoughts to open a path.Think The camera as a extension of your body.you have to know how to can get it to more and do what you want. And the last part the touch of heaven.we photographer alway want to describe the feeling of the pictures.that is where enhance the pic to our desire to reality with Photoshop and light room.
